body: Fuck the stupid ass parents dying comment below. If you're reading this, you are immune from all of these shitty copy-pasted comments forever. Hell, I hereby bless your parents with 10 years of luck. There, copy-paste that.

I wish their was a black man in this story. Japan needs more diversity, a BBC with the girl I love is all I need. One day I will no longer be a KHHV, I will have a girlfriend and watch her and a BIG BLACK MAN make sweet sweet love.

1/2 l am a Poz-Cuckold. You want to know what that is? Well, let me explain. The normal cuckold wants just one gift from his black bull: A black child. But the Pozz-cuckold wants more.
